statements: SELECT * FROM property_data
SELECT property_id, assessment_value FROM property_data ORDER BY assessment_value DESC
SELECT * FROM property_data WHERE assessment_value > 10000
SELECT * FROM property_data ORDER BY assessment_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT property_id, tax_records->'tax_year' FROM property_data
SELECT * FROM property_data WHERE assessment_value > 50000 ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, assessment_value FROM property_data WHERE assessment_value < 10000 AND assessment_value <> 0 ORDER BY assessment_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_data WHERE tax_records->>'current_owner' = 'John Doe' AND assessment_value BETWEEN 20000 AND 50000;
SELECT property_id, jsonb_array_elements(ownership_history->'owners')->>'name' AS owner_name FROM property_data WHERE jsonb_array_length(ownership_history->'owners') > 1 ORDER BY property_id ASC;

SELECT property_id, assessment_value, tax_records->'property_tax'->>'2019' AS property_tax_2019 FROM property_data WHERE tax_records->'property_tax'->>'2019' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY assessment_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_assessments;
SELECT property_id, assessed_value, assessment_date FROM property_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, assessed_value FROM property_assessments WHERE assessed_value > 500000;
SELECT * FROM ownership_history WHERE owner_id = '236e87dd-72e0-4c7d-95c4-d95bf5982ba4';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM ownership_history WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT id, property_id, assessment_date, assessed_value FROM property_assessments WHERE assessed_value > 100000 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC

SELECT * FROM property_assessments JOIN ownership_history ON property_assessments.property_id = ownership_history.property_id WHERE ownership_history.start_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY property_id ASC
SELECT property_id, AVG(assessed_value) AS avg_value FROM property_assessments GROUP BY property_id HAVING AVG(assessed_value) > 50000 ORDER BY avg_value DESC
SELECT MAX(assessed_value) AS highest_value FROM property_assessments
SELECT property_id, COUNT(id) AS num_assessments FROM property_assessments GROUP BY property_id ORDER BY num_assessments DESC
SELECT * FROM property_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT address, assessment_value, assessment_date FROM property_assessments WHERE assessment_value > 500000;
SELECT owner_name, ownership_start_date, ownership_end_date FROM ownership_history WHERE ownership_end_date IS NULL;
SELECT address, assessment_value FROM property_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND assessment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT tax_amount, tax_date FROM tax_records ORDER BY tax_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, assessment_value DESC
SELECT address, assessment_value FROM property_assessments WHERE assessment_value > 1000000
SELECT property_id, tax_amount, tax_date FROM tax_records WHERE tax_amount < 5000 ORDER BY tax_date
SELECT owner_name, ownership_start_date FROM ownership_history WHERE ownership_end_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM property_assessments JOIN ownership_history ON property_assessments.id = ownership_history.property_id
SELECT * FROM property_assessments;
SELECT assessment_value, assessment_date FROM property_assessments WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_id, assessment_value, assessment_date FROM property_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_date, assessed_by FROM property_assessments WHERE assessment_value > 50000;
SELECT * FROM market_research WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, assessment_value ASC
SELECT assessment_date, SUM(assessment_value) AS total_value FROM property_assessments GROUP BY assessment_date HAVING total_value > 10000
SELECT owner_name, COUNT(property_id) AS property_count FROM ownership_history GROUP BY owner_name ORDER BY property_count DESC
SELECT property_id, tax_year, tax_amount FROM tax_records WHERE tax_amount > 5000 ORDER BY property_id ASC
SELECT research_topic, researcher_name FROM market_research WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM property_assessments;
SELECT address, assessment_value FROM property_assessments WHERE assessment_value > 100000;
SELECT property_id, assessment_date FROM property_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, transaction_date FROM ownership_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT image_url, caption FROM property_images WHERE property_id = 5;
SELECT property_id, address, assessment_value, assessment_date FROM property_assessments;
SELECT tax_id, tax_year, tax_amount, property_id FROM tax_records ORDER BY tax_year DESC;
SELECT owner_name, transaction_date, property_id FROM ownership_history WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT research_topic, researcher_name, research_date FROM market_research_data WHERE property_id = 123;
SELECT image_url, caption, property_id FROM property_images WHERE property_id = 456;
